caller_intent: The caller wanted to verify the issue date on a reinstatement document for a policyholder (Michelle and Scott Milford) with policy number 5544160.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's request to verify the issue date on a reinstatement document.
Agent asked for the policy number and names of the policyholders (received: 5544160, Michelle and Scott Milford).
Agent informed the caller they would transfer the call to an appropriate agent and placed the caller on hold ('rephone').
summary: A caller from Bank of America requested verification of a reinstatement document's issue date for policy 5544160. The agent collected policy details and transferred the call to an appropriate agent for further assistance.
